Title: HEAVY WEAPON UNIT09 VORTEX DRIVER
Specifications: Plastic Model
Descriptions: A KOTOBUKIYA Japanese import!  With new Modeling Support Goods Heavy Weapon Units from Kotobukiya you can equip your Frame Arms robots and any other model kits in their scale like never before!  The latest all new customizable add-on weapon set is the VORTEX DRIVER, a fearsome melee weapon system with options for drill, driver, and cutter applications.  The kit consists of 20 pieces that can be assembled into different configurations on its own as a unique weapon or as part of your robot models!  Perfect for use with the Frame Arms series of customizable plastic kits, the Vortex Driver adds even more options when paired with other Modeling Support Goods products from Kotobukiya.

Title: ARTFX J Yami Bakura
Specifications: Pre-Painted PVC Figure
Descriptions: From the card game anime masterpiece Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters, the next character to join the ARTFX J series is Yugi’s nemesis: Yami Bakura!

Title: HRESVELGR=ATER Summer Vacation Ver.

Descriptions: Based on the Frame Arms model designed by Tomotake Kinoshita with character art created by E-ji Komatsu, Frame Arms Girl HRESVELGR is now available in a new Summer Vacation Ver.!

Title: Miku Nakano
Specifications: Pre-Painted PVC Figure
Descriptions: Miku Nakano from the hit anime The Quintessential Quintuplets is now available as a 1/8 scale figure!

Title: ARTFX J Hajime Hinata
Specifications: Pre-Painted PVC Figure
Descriptions: Characters from the popular high-speed mystery action game, “SUPER DANGANRONPA 2: Sayonara Zetsubou Gakuen,” are joining the ARTFX J series! The first in the lineup is the protagonist of the game with the title of “Ultimate ???”: Hajime Hinata!

Title: ARTFX J Nagito Komaeda
Specifications: Pre-Painted PVC Figure
Descriptions: Characters from the popular high-speed mystery action game, “SUPER DANGANRONPA 2: Sayonara Zetsubou Gakuen,” are joining the ARTFX J series! The second in the lineup is the “Ultimate Lucky Student”: Nagito Komaeda!

Title: Crymaria Levin
Specifications: Painted 1/6th scale ABS&PVC complete figure with stand included. Approximately 360mm in height (280mm to top of head without stand base).
Descriptions:
The legendary Winter Witch is now a 1/6th scale figure!
From the PlayStation®4 game "Valkyria Chronicles 4" comes a 1/6th scale figure of Crymaria Levin. Character designer Raita Honjou's illustration of Crymaria has been brought to life in extraordinary detail. The Winter Witch's dignified, impressive appearance has been carefully preserved in figure form. 
The decorations and details adorning her outfit have been faithfully recreated with the use of special paintwork to bring out the textural differences of every detail. The figure stands over 30cm in height. Be sure to add her to your collection!
Crymaria Levin Special Site
https://special.goodsmile.info/crymaria_levin/en/

Title: Hatsune Miku: Kentaro Yabuki x osoba Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 250mm in height
Descriptions:
A scale figure of Miku based on an incredibly cute design by Kentaro Yabuki!
Kentaro Yabuki's futuristic Hatsune Miku design has been recreated as a scale figure under the complete supervision of Kentaro Yabuki himself! Her dynamic pose, detailed hair recreated with translucent parts and delicate paintwork, futuristic outfit and the figure's stunning base have all be created with the utmost attention to detail. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Riela Marcellis
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC 1/7th scale complete product with stand included. Approximately 250mm in height.
Descriptions:
The kind-hearted Valkyria, now in a swimsuit!
From "Valkyria Chronicles DUEL" comes a scale figure of the Valkyria Riela Marcellis! The figure features Riela in a bold bikini outfit holding a beachball. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Shiro: Summer Season Ver.
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC 1/7th scale figure with stand included. Approximately 190mm in height.
Descriptions:
Shiro in a new summer outfit!
From the anime series "No Game No Life" comes a 1/7th scale figure of the younger of the 'Kuuhaku' gamer siblings, Shiro! Shiro's typical shut-in style has been traded out for a swimsuit, swim ring, snorkel and yukata! 
The figure features the creative touch and colors of the series' unique style, further enhancing its tropical atmosphere. Her goldfish bag that contains not a goldfish, but Sora, has been created in stunning detail. Don't miss the unique pattern of her kneesocks as well! Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Archer/Jeanne d'Arc
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 245mm in height.
Descriptions:
"It's a secret. It's a secret, okay?"
From the popular smartphone game "Fate/Grand Order" comes a scale figure of Jeanne d'Arc as an Archer class servant in her swimsuit! Different from her Ruler appearance, her Archer appearance features Jeanne dressed in a black bikini and a blue hoodie, while her fair skin is perfectly complemented by the sandy beach beneath her feet. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Alter Ego/Okita Souji (Alter) -Absolute Blade: Endless Three Stage-
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 235mm in height and 450mm in length (from the sword tip to back of figure)).
Descriptions:
Immeasurable, Unhindered, Unbound. The three beams weave together into Eternity—
From the popular smartphone game "Fate/Grand Order" comes a scale figure of the Alter Ego class servant and Counter Guardian Okita Souji (Alter) in her Third Ascension appearance. She is equipped with her pitch-black blade Purgatory and has been captured in the very moment she is preparing to unleash her Noble Phantasm "Absolute Blade: Endless Three Stage". 
Her decisive, dignified expression, flowing pale pink hair and all of her armor and equipment have been recreated and carefully painted to preserve the appearance of differing textures in each area. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Uruka Takemoto
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 230mm in height
Descriptions:
A scale figure of Uruka Takemoto!
From the anime series "We Never Learn: BOKUBEN" comes a 1/7th scale figure of Uruka Takemoto! She's been recreated changing clothes after her club activity. Her surprised, embarrassed expression and tan skin have been faithfully recreated in figure form. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Miyako Muguruma
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC figure with stand included. Approximately 250mm in height.
Descriptions:
"Hero Cannon...fire!"
From the popular anime series "Warlords of Sigrdrifa" comes a 1/7th scale figure of the Valkyrie Miyako Muguruma! The figure has been created based on an original illustration by character designer Takuya Fujima. Miyako's bright personality and dynamic pose from the illustration have been captured in figure form. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Ann Takamaki
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 210mm in height (including base).
Descriptions:
"Dance, Carmen!"
From the Persona series rhythm game "Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight" comes a scale figure of Ann Takamaki! She's been recreated in a winking pose in her Ball Stage Outfit based on the game's key visual. Her tights feature a real net material for a realistic appearance, and her hat can be removed for a different display option. A stylish base featuring the game's logo is also included.

Title: Shang Xirui: Peking Opera - Zhao Feiyan Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 360mm in height.
Descriptions:
The elegant, genius Peking Opera performer.
From the popular Chinese television series "Winter Begonia" comes a 1/7th scale figure of Shanng Xirui in his costume as Zhao Feiyan!
Even the finest details of the real outfit have been faithfully preserved in figure form. The flowing kimono has been sculpted so as to look as though it is in motion, while the various decorations adorning the outfit have been carefully recreated with the textures of each decoration in mind. Be sure to add this stunning figure of Shang Xirui to your collection!

Title: Foreigner/Katsushika Hokusai
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 280mm in height
Descriptions:
"My kimono being all disheveled like an oiran is a good look for me? Aw, q-quit it...that's embarrassing... ...Even Toto-sama's gone all quiet."
From the popular smartphone game "Fate/Grand Order" comes a scale figure of the Foreigner class servant Katsushika Hokusai. Her obi belt and various flower decorations throughout the figure have been faithfully captured in figure form. She's been recreated based on her 2nd Ascension appearance, with her chest boldly exposed beneath her disheveled kimono.
Wave effect parts and plover bird effect parts based on Hokusai's woodblock print "Mount Fuji Above the Sea" are included and easily attached to the figure, making for a beautifully detailed display piece. Be sure to add her to your collection!



Luxury Gift is a new product lineup by Phat! Company. The series features highly detailed recreations of your favorite characters with a focus on atmosphere like never seen before. Enjoy collecting!

Title: Reimu Hakurei
Specifications: Painted 1/8th scale ABS&PVC product with stand included. Approximately 260mm in height.
Descriptions:
The shrine maiden of Hakurei Shrine.
From the Touhou Project derivative RPG game "Touhou: Lost Word" comes a 1/8th scale figure of the shrine maiden of Hakurei Shrine, Reimu Hakurei! The scale figure is based on an illustration by Touhou: Lost Word illustrator Rote Yumeno. 
The figure is based on an original illustration with a special expression, drawn for the purpose of making the figure. The figure also features various effect parts recreated with translucent parts to match the original illustration. Her flowing hair and skirt have also been sculpted with care. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: figma The Trapper
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 155mm in height.
Descriptions:
Death Is Not an Escape.
From the popular multiplayer horror game "Dead by Daylight" comes a figma of the Killer who wears an eerie smiling mask, The Trapper.

Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can create a variety of action-packed poses from the game.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
An interchangeable head without his mask is also included.
Optional parts include his bloodstained cleaver, a bear trap and a Meat Hook equipped with a 3mm joint that can be used to hook other figma action figures.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

Title: b'Nero Claudius: Racing Ver. '
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 250mm in height (including lollipop sign).
Descriptions:
b"
The Roman Emperor, promising the team's success.
Presenting a scale figure of Nero Claudius in her GOODSMILE RACING & TYPE-MOON RACING costume! The original illustration by Arco Wada has been carefully recreated. Her outfit is sporty and elegant, featuring a halberd-shaped lollipop sign, shining gold armor and a racing suit that features varied black and red coloring. Be sure to add her to your collection!
"

Title: b"Jeanne d'Arc: Racing Ver. "
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC 1/7th scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 245mm in height.
Descriptions:
b"
The saint praying for the team's success.
Presenting a scale figure of Jeanne d'Arc in her GOODSMILE RACING & TYPE-MOON RACING costume! The original illustration by Ototsugu Konoe has been carefully recreated. Jeanne is posed with her wheel gun, dressed in her purple and black racing suit and silver armor. Even the asphalt-like base has been created in incredible detail. Be sure to add her to your collection!
"

Title: Cocoa: Warrior Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 225mm in height.
Descriptions:
"Dive into my heart!"
From the popular smartphone game "Kirara Fantasia" comes a scale figure of the "Warrior" Cocoa! Different from her normal café uniform, Cocoa is dressed in her battle outfit! Cocoa has been recreated with a playful expression on her face as she carries her sword on her back and coffee cup in her hand. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Hatsune Miku: Deep Sea Girl ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/8th scale PVC figure with stand included. Approximately 160mm in height.
Descriptions:
The story of a girl surrounded by bliss.
From Yuuyu-P's popular song with over a million views on Nico Nico Douga, 'Deep Sea Girl' comes a rerelease of the popular 1/8th scale Hatsune Miku figure! The figure is based on the beautiful illustration by Haruyo, drawn in commemoration of the song being selected as a part of the Million Saisei & EXIT TUNES PRESENTS vocalodream album.
Miku is posed sitting at the bottom of the deep sea, with her beautiful pale skin contrasting with her jet black dress. Her hair and the coral around her gently sway in the ocean current, painting a beautiful underwater scene for fans to enjoy.

Title: Aigis
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 200mm in height (including base).
Descriptions:
"I want to be the world's first dancing anti-Shadow weapon!"
From the Persona series rhythm game "Persona 3: Dancing in Moonlight" comes a scale figure of Aigis! She's been recreated in a dancing pose in her Ball Stage Outfit based on the game's key visual. The mechanical design of her headphones and arm panels have been faithfully captured in figure form. A stylish base featuring the game's logo is also included.

Title: b'figma Sailor Outfit Body (Emily) '
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 130mm in height.
Descriptions:
b'
School life in figma form!
The original character Emily is joining the figma Styles series in a sailor outfit!

Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can create a variety of different poses.
She comes with both a smiling face and a pouting face with puffed out cheeks.
Her pleated skirt is made out of fabric, making it easy to adjust for posing.
Her etched metal glasses are removable.
The figure is standard figma size, allowing you to switch head parts with other characters! (Not compatible with all figmas.)
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.


\xe2\x86\x92What is figma Styles?
'

Title: Yoto Hime: Scarlet Saber Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/8th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 120mm in height.
Descriptions:
"'Strong' and 'weak'; which side is happier?"
From the smartphone game "Onmyoji" comes a 1/8th scale figure of Yoto Hime! She has been faithfully recreated in her appearance from the skin "Scarlet Saber"! The figure features a sexy atmosphere, and her cursed blade and cherry blossom patterned kimono have been created in stunning detail. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Asuna: Knights of the Blood Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/4th scale PVC figure with stand included. Approximately 410mm in height.
Descriptions:
A large scale figure of Asuna in her Knights of the Blood outfit!
From the popular anime series "Sword Art Online Alicization: War of Underworld" comes a 1/4th scale figure of Asuna in her Knights of the Blood outfit! The contrasting red and white colors of her outfit, flowing sculpt of her cape and her smoothly drawn rapier, Lambent Light, have all been captured in amazing detail. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Racing Miku 2020 Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/8th scale ABS&PVC product with stand included. Approximately 230mm in height.
Descriptions:
A scale figure of the official character of the 2020 Hatsune Miku GT Project!
The official character of the 2020 Hatsune Miku GT Project, Racing Miku 2020 Ver. by popular illustrator LEN[A-7], is now a 1/8th scale figure! The original 2020 Racing Miku illustration by LEN[A-7] has been carefully brought to life in eye-popping detail.
The figure features a perfect balance between the mechanical parts featured on her boots and headphones and her adorable, fit physique. Be sure to add her to your collection!
*This product is a GSR coupon item.
https://www.goodsmileracing.com/sponsors/coupon/?language=en

Title: Stella
Released Date: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC product with stand included. Approximately 250mm in height.
Specifications: Akimof
Descriptions:
A devilishly fashionable new figure!
From illustrator saitom's collection of illustrations featuring devil girls and fashion, "DF", comes a new scale figure! Her soft, curvaceous body from saitom's original illustration has been faithfully recreated in figure form. Her jacket's shiny outer shell and space-themed inner design have been carefully recreated as well. Her horns and tail feature candy paintwork for a detailed look that is not to be missed! Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Priestess
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC figure with stand included. Approximately 240mm in height (including hat).
Descriptions:
"I'm going with you. I can't leave you alone."
From the popular anime series "GOBLIN SLAYER" comes a 1/7th scale figure of Goblin Slayer's party member and the main character of the series: Priestess!
Priestess has been recreated in figure form based on the cover art of the first volume of the light novel. She has a peaceful smile on her face as she joins her hands together to pray. Her blonde hair has been recreated using translucent parts, giving it a somewhat see-through appearance. Her hat can also be removed, allowing for a different display option. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Ram
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC figure with stand included. Approximately 225mm in height.
Descriptions:
"I am Rem's older sister. That is one thing that can never be taken from me."
From the popular anime series 'Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-' comes a rerelease of the 1/7th scale figure of the older of the twin maids that serve at the Roswaal mansion - Ram! The figure is based on the 2nd volume of the Blu-ray/DVD jacket cover for the series and features Ram wearing her characteristic maid outfit while holding a deck brush out in her right hand.
Ram is in a more resolute pose when compared to Rem, but her soft-looking lady-like figure has also been faithfully preserved on the figure for fans to enjoy! The base of the figure is specially designed to link together with that of the previously announced 1/7th scale figure of Rem to display the twin sisters together! Be sure to display Ram together with her beloved Rem!


Made at GSC's 'Lucky Factory' in Tottori, Japan.
The rerelease of this product will be made at Good Smile Company's 'Lucky Factory' in Tottori, Japan. The product will be proudly 'Made in Japan', and sent all over the world for fans to enjoy!

Title: figma Red Pyramid Thing
Specifications: Painted ABS & PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 200mm in height
Descriptions:
The nightmare is back - Silent Hill's executioner is being rereleased once again!
From the highly acclaimed horror game 'SILENT HILL 2' comes a rerelease of figma 'Red Pyramid Thing' also known as 'Pyramid Head' - easily the most popular monster in the series!

Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
The Pyramid Head's symbolic 'Great Knife' and 'Spear' are both included along with a number of hand parts.
An articulated figma stand is included, allowing various poses to be taken.

Title: figma Motoko Kusanagi: SAC_2045 ver.
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 140mm in height.
Descriptions:
"Wonderful not to have any noise."
From the Netflix original anime series "Ghost in the Shell: SAC_2045" comes a figma of Motoko Kusanagi!

The smooth yet posable figma joints allow you to act out a variety of different scenes from the series.
She comes with three face plates—a determined face, a shouting face and a smiling face.
Her handgun and assault rifle are included along with an alternate body part to display her with her jacket off.

KADOKAWA presents a new figure brand, KDcolle (KADOKAWA Collection), featuring figures with style only possible for KADOKAWA to create. Title: Hana Uzaki: Manga Café Asia Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale PVC figure with stand included. Approximately 225mm in height.
Descriptions:
A new scale figure of Uzaki based on the source material and created with the guidance of Take!
From the popular manga series "Uzaki-chan Wants to Hang out!" comes a scale figure of Hana Uzaki! The figure is based on the cover illustration of the third volume of the manga, featuring Uzaki-chan in her Café Asia uniform! Uzaki-chan's adorable yet annoying expression has been captured in figure form! Two face plates and an alternate chest part are included with the figure for multiple display options!

What is KDcolle?
KADOKAWA presents a new figure brand, KDcolle (KADOKAWA Collection), featuring figures with style only possible for KADOKAWA to create. With a charm unique to experienced publishing company KADOKAWA, we bring you a new series of figures sure to make your heart beat with excitement! Expect more from the KDcolle series coming soon!

Title: Hyakkimaru feat. Sayoko Kamitsure
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 270mm in height.
Descriptions:
Hyakkimaru x Sculptor: Sayoko Kamitsure
From the popular anime series "Dororo" comes a scale figure of Hyakkimaru by sculptor Sayoko Kamitsure! While preserving the design from the anime, Sayoko Kamitsure has recreated Hyakkimaru in stunning detail, posed as though having just finished a battle. While the figure itself is not flashy, the atmosphere of the world of Dororo has been expertly captured. Be sure to add Hyakkimaru to your collection.

Comment from Sculptor Sayoko Kamitsure:
I set out to sculpt Hyakkimaru in a way that captured his intensity and conviction from the front, while preserving a sense of loneliness when viewed from the back.
I sculpted his prosthetic limbs with particular care, first by simulating articulated joints and then sculpting them to look as though they are actually movable. The differences between his real leg and prosthetic leg really stand out on the rock base, making it quite a visually appealing part of the figure.

Title: Gd DSR-50: Best Offer Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 240mm in height.
Descriptions:
A new scale figure of the large-bore anti-material rifle T-Doll Gd DSR-50 in her 2nd Anniversary outfit is here!
From the popular tactical simulation smartphone game "Girls' Frontline" comes a 1/7th scale figure of Gd DSR-50! She's been recreated in her elegant "Best Offer Ver." outfit from the game's 2nd Anniversary. Translucent parts have been used to recreate certain parts of her dress, while the lace patterns of her dress have been sculpted from underneath the dress, lending her outfit a somewhat see-through appearance that glistens when light is shined on it. Her weapon and gun case have also been carefully sculpted and painted for maximum detail. Be sure to add this luxurious T-Doll to your collection!

Title: figma Ai Nishibe

Set Contents:

Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.

An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

- Who is the Little Armory's Ai Nishibe? -
Ai Nishibe is one of the characters seen on the Little Armory packaging, illustrated by Haruaki Fuyuno. She a 3rd-year student at Hachinohe Academy.

Title: COMBAT ARMORS MAX23: Abitate F44D Desert Gunner
Specifications: PS&PE assemblable plastic model kit. Water-application decals included. 1/72 Scale. Approximately 140mm in height.
Descriptions:
Presenting a new kit of the Desert Gunner!
From "Fang of the Sun Dougram" comes a 1/72 scale plastic model of the Desert Gunner! Miniature figures of Fester and Chico from the series are included in the same scale. Be sure to display with other Combat Armors to recreate scenes from the series!

The six-legged Desert Gunner has been carefully brought into plastic model kit form.
This model kit makes use of snap-fit connections. (Glue required for some parts.)
Each joint makes use of a poly-cap, allowing for smooth and easy posing of the finished product.
Miniature figures of Fester, Chico and a sidecar are included.
The various markings on the Dougram are included as water-application decals.
The kit was designed in cooperation with mechanical designer Takahiro Yamada.
The box art features illustrations by Hidetaka Tenjin.

This figma is based on soldiers in the Terracotta Army found at the Mausoleum of the First Qin Emperor. The staue has been carefully brought into figma form for everyone to enjoy. The smooth yet posable figma joints allow you to create a variety of different poses.
A flexible plastic is used in specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
Three face plates, a crossbow, a sword and interchangeable parts to display the figure kneeling are included, allowing for multiple display options.

Title: Gwenpool: Breaking the Fourth Wall
Specifications: Painted 1/8th scale ABS&PVC figure with stand included. Approximately 240mm in height.
Descriptions:
Gwenpool—now breaking into the figure world!
MARVEL's unique hero Gwenpool is now a 1/8th scale figure! Gwenpool has been recreated breaking the fourth wall based on an illustration by Gurihiru! Gwenpool, the hero who broke her way into the comic world, has been recreated with an energetic smile on her face (alternative mask part also included) in a dynamic pose. 
The background features explosions and missiles sculpted with a forced perspective effect. The figure has been painted in a unique way that attempts to mimic the shadows and highlights normally seen in American-style comic books, allowing you to enjoy that familiar 2D style in a new 3D form! Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: MODEROID Shinkalion Doctor Yellow
Specifications: PS&ABS assemblable plastic model kit. Not to scale. Approximately 180mm in height when built.
Descriptions:
A new plastic model of Shinkalion Doctor Yellow!
From "Shinkansen Henkei Robo Shinkalion" comes a MODEROID plastic model of Shinkalion Doctor Yellow. The model is fully articulated and comes with Laser Scanner parts and 2 laser weapons that can be displayed in either gun or sword mode. Interchangeable large fist and open hand parts are also included for recreating action scenes from the series. The model is made from PS and ABS plastic with POM used for some parts. The parts have been separated into yellow, light gray, gray and clear blue runners, and pre-painted parts and water-slide decals are included, making it easy to recreate the mecha from the series with a simple assembly.
*This model is meant for display in Shinkalion mode. The model cannot be transformed into Shinkansen mode.

Also available: MODEROID Shinkalion E5 x Doctor Yellow

The model is fully articulated and comes with Laser Scanner parts, 2 laser weapons and interchangeable large fist and open hand parts. Parts to recreate Ultra Gran Cross Firing Mode are also included. The model is made from PS and ABS plastic with POM used for some parts. The parts have been separated into green, white, yellow, light gray, gray and clear blue runners, and pre-painted parts and water-slide decals are included, making it easy to recreate the mecha from the series with a simple assembly.

Title: figma Rem
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 130mm in height.
Descriptions:
"You're fanatical like a demon."
From the anime series "Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-" comes a rerelease of the figma of the younger of the maids working at the Roswaal mansion - Rem!

Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three expressions including a blank face, a cute smile as well as a grinning expression in demon form.
Optional parts include a tray, alternate hair parts for her demon form as well as her morning star.
The morning star comes in both a static form for action poses as well as a second form with a real chain.
Hand parts that allow her to hold hands with figma Ram are also included. Be sure to display the twins together!
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

Title: Nendoroid Doll Angel: Ciel
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale figure with stand included. Other Materials: Cotton, Polyester, Magnets, Copper. Approximately 140mm in height.
Descriptions:
A new original character, "Angel: Ciel", joins the Nendoroid Doll series!
The Nendoroid Doll series of palm-sized action figures feature the same heads as standard Nendoroids, but alternate doll-like bodies that are highly articulated and can easily be dressed-up into different outfits!
The next original character to join the Nendoroid Doll series is Angel: Ciel, a curious and lively boy. His halo, wings and the skirt portion of his shorts are all removable. The head part of the Nendoroid can easily be switched with previously released Nendoroids allowing you to dress-up your favorite characters in an all new outfit!
*Please note that some Nendoroids may not be compatible depending on their individual specifications.

The sculpting and paintwork of the master statue were both handled by Ryu Oyama. While the statue features a more muted color palette, the subtle color variation across the figure is worthy of a close look. Be sure to add the Great Old One to your collection.

Title: Tohka Yatogami: China Dress Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC figure with stand included (*no phthalates used in the making of this product). Approximately 240mm in height (including stand).
Descriptions:
Tohka Yatogami dancing in in a Chinese dress!
From the popular anime series "Date A Live III" comes a 1/7th scale figure of Tohka Yatogami! Tohka has been recreated dancing in an adorable Chinese dress. Particular care has been taken to sculpting her flowing hair. Be sure to display her with Kurumi Tokisaki: China Dress Ver. (sold separately) for an even grander display!

Title: Welrod Mk II
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC 1/7th scale complete product with stand included. Approximately 220mm in height.
Descriptions:
"Let's press on in the darkness with the northern wind at our backs."
From the popular smartphone combat simulation game "Girls' Frontline" comes a 1/7th scale figure of Welrod Mk II. Her black overcoat slung over her shoulder, leather garter belts and her notably fit physique visible beneath her tight outfit have all been faithfully captured and recreated. Be sure to add the T-Doll that presses forward through the darkness and executes the Commander's orders without fail to your collection.

Title: Echidna: Tea Party Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC figure with stand included. Approximately 195mm in height.
Descriptions:
"Now you can talk to me all you'd like. So, what do you want to ask?"
From the "Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-: The Heroines' Tea Party" event that took place at the Tree Village shop in Tokyo Solamachi in November 2017 comes a scale figure series based on the official illustration from the event. The fifth figure of the series is the Witch of Greed, Echidna.
Echidna has a gentle, quiet expression on her face as she enjoys the tea party. Her beautiful white hair and slim outfit have been recreated in stunning detail. Be sure to display her with the other Tea Party series figures of Emilia, Ram, Rem and Beatrice!

Title: Nendoroid Tomato Head
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale fully articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 100mm in height.
Descriptions:
Fresh from the oven!
From the popular game Fortnite comes a Nendoroid inspired by the Tomato Head outfit! The figure is fully articulated so you create your own action-packed scenes!
Tomato Head is ready to get a slice of the action with the Axeroni pickaxe and rocket launcher. Be sure to add Tomato Head to your collection, along with the other Nendoroids in the Fortnite series!

Title: Madoka Kaname: Rabbit Ears Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/4th scale PVC product with stand included. Approximately 410mm in height.
Descriptions:
Madoka Kaname in an adorable dress with rabbit ears!
From the popular anime film "Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie -Rebellion-" comes a big size figure of Madoka Kaname! She has been recreated in an adorable original one piece dress with matching rabbit ears.
Madoka's gentle expression and dynamic pose have been brought to life by sculptor Hiroshi (Sakurazensen) in extraordinary detail. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: Felicia Mitsuki
Specifications: Painted PVC 1/8th scale complete product with stand included. Approximately 190mm in height.
Descriptions:
"Witches... I'll get rid of them all!"
From the smartphone game with a currently airing anime series, "Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story: Magia Record" comes a 1/8th scale figure of Felicia Mitsuki! Felicia has been recreated swinging her giant hammer. Her unique hood and ribbon have been faithfully recreated based on her original design. Be sure to display her with Sana Futaba (sold separately) for an even grander display!

Title: Nendoroid Saburo Yamada
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 100mm in height.
Descriptions:
From Hypnosis Mic comes a Nendoroid of Saburo Yamada!
From "Hypnosis Mic -Division Rap Battle-" comes a Nendoroid of Saburo Yamada from the Ikebukuro Division! He comes with three face plates including his standard expression, an intense rap battle expression and a smiling expression.
Saburo also comes with a chess set as an optional part. His "MC.L.B" hypnosis mic is included as well. Display with the other Nendoroids in the "Hypnosis Mic -Division Rap Battle-" Nendoroid series to recreate rap battles and other situations! Be sure to add the youngest of the three Yamada brothers to your collection!

Title: b'Uguisumaru '
Specifications: Painted 1/8th scale ABS&PVC figure with stand included. Approximately 225mm in height.
Descriptions:
b'
"I am the Kobizen sword Uguisumaru. I'm not sure where I got my name from, but well, I'm pleased to meet you."

From the popular browser and smartphone game "Touken Ranbu -ONLINE-" comes a 1/8th scale figure of Uguisumaru! His standing pose has been faithfully recreated. His clear gaze as though staring straight into your heart, naturally confident stance and muscular build visible underneath his outfit have all been captured and meticulously recreated. Enjoy all of the charming details of the sculpt that can only exist in figure form. Be sure to add him to your collection!

Title: Nendoroid Dabi
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale fully articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 100mm in height.
Descriptions:
"That's sad... Shoto...  Todoroki..."
From the popular anime series "My Hero Academia" comes a Nendoroid of Dabi, member of the League of Villains! He comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a condescending laughing expression and a crazed expression! 
Three kinds of flame effect parts for recreating Dabi's unidentified Quirk are included along with a "FOOOOSH" text plate for recreating action scenes. Be sure to add him to your collection!

Title: Filo
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 130mm in height.
Descriptions:
"Time to dig in!"
From the anime series "The Rising of the Shield Hero" comes a 1/7th scale figure of the Filolial Queen Filo! Filo has been recreated chowing down on a hotdog. Her blonde hair, fluffy wings, delicate skin and blue eyes have been faithfully painted in stunning detail. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: figma Female Swimsuit Body (Makoto)
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 135mm in height
Descriptions:
Summertime activities in figma form!
The original character Makoto has arrived in a sporty swimsuit!

She comes with a determined smiling face plate.
The figma is taller than figma Swimsuit Body (Emily), and features an overall more toned physique.
A T-shirt made of flexible material is also included.
The figure is standard figma size, allowing you to switch head parts with other characters! (Not compatible with all figmas.)
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

Title: b'POP UP PARADE Yuna '
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 170mm in height.
Descriptions:
b'
Yuna from "Kuma Kuma Kuma Bear" joins the POP UP PARADE series!
POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure typically stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!
From the anime series "Kuma Kuma Kuma Bear" comes a POP UP PARADE figure of Yuna! Her Black Bear's Glove and White Bear's Glove have both been perfectly captured in figure form! Be sure to add her to your collection!
\xe2\x96\xbcPOP UP PARADE Special Site
https://special.goodsmile.info/popupparade/

Title: PLAMAX MS-10 SENOUMARU
Specifications: ABS&PS&PE ready-to-assemble non-scale plastic model kit. Foil stickers included. Approximately 80mm in height.
Descriptions:
The 10th model in the Wataru series is SENOUMARU!
From the anime series "Mashin Hero Wataru" comes a PLAMAX plastic model of SENOUMARU! SENOUMARU's swords and trident are included along with hand parts to pose the model holding them. The model features a wide range of articulation, allowing you to recreate the pose from its lethal technique. Be sure to display with RYUOUMARU and KUOUMARU!

This model kit makes use of snap-fit connections for easy assembly. No glue required.
Gripping hands, weapon holding hands and open hands are included.
Foil stickers are used to represent the coloring of certain areas.

Title: MODEROID ED-209
Specifications: PS&ABS assemblable plastic model kit. Not to scale. Approximately 200mm in height when built.
Descriptions:
"Please put down your weapon. You have twenty seconds to comply."
From the movie "ROBOCOP" comes a MODEROID plastic model of ED-209, the peacekeeping machine created by Omni Consumer Products. The model stands at around 20cm tall when completed. Its joints, pistons and slide rails are all articulated, allowing you to recreate intimidating poses and comical poses alike.
The model kit is made of PS and ABS plastic with POM and PE used for some joints and features runners separated into four colors (light gray, silver, medium gray, dark gray). Wires have been used to recreate the cables connecting to its arms. Water-slide decals are included for further detailing. Preassembled joints are included, making the model easy to pose. Be sure to add it to your collection along with HAGANE WORKS ROBOCOP!
MODEROID Special Site
https://www.goodsmile.info/en/moderoid/

Title: LittleArmory-OP4: figma Hands for Guns
Specifications: PVC articulated figure hand parts. Non-scale. 4 left hand and 4 right hand parts included. PS non-articulated joint parts included.
Descriptions:
The popular set of bare hands to hold guns is back for a rerelease!
TOMYTEC's 'LittleArmory' series is a set of weapons that can be used by 1/12th scale figures. This set of figma hands allows figma figures to hold the weapons from the LittleArmory set! Following on from the popular tactical gloves comes a rerelease of this set of bare hands with skin color matching that of the figma Miyo Asato and figma Ena Toyosaki!
The hand parts have been matted and include four different hands for a total of eight pieces that allow the guns to be held, readied and carefully aimed! Use them together with the LittleArmory series for all sorts of new posing options!
The parts can also be used with FREEing's S-style figures Ena Toyosaki: Swimsuit Ver. and Maria Teruyasu: Swimsuit Ver.!
· Parts are sold as a connected plastic kit. Parts require no assembly but do require tools to be cut apart.
· This is a set of hand parts that allow figma figures to hold items from TOMYTEC's LittleArmory set.
· The LittleArmory weapons and figma Miyo Asato are not included. This kit includes the hand parts only.
· Parts are designed and colored to match figma Miyo Asato and figma Ena Toyosaki.
See below for more information about the LittleArmory series! (Japanese)
LittleArmory WEB: http://www.littlearmory.jp/

Title: figma Lucina
Specifications: Painted ABS & ATBC-PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 140mm in height
Descriptions:
"I challenge my fate!”
From the popular Nintendo 3DS game 'Fire Emblem: Awakening' comes a second rerelease of figma Lucina, the character who comes from a ruined future.

Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with both a confident staring expression as well as a gentle smiling face.
Alternate hair parts allow you to display her as she looked disguised at the start of the game.
Her cape can easily be attached and removed.
Special handle parts can be attached to the scabbard, allowing you to display her with her falchion sheathed.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

Title: Nendoroid Doll Richard Ranasinghe de Vulpian
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 140mm in height. Other Materials: Cotton, Polyester, Magnets.
Descriptions:
Jeweler Richard is now a Nendoroid Doll!
From the anime series "The Case Files of Jeweler Richard" comes a Nendoroid Doll of Richard Ranasinghe de Vulpian! Nendoroid Dolls feature the same Nendoroid heads, but an alternate doll-like body that is highly articulated and can easily be dressed-up into different outfits while still remaining a palm-sized action figure! Be sure to add Richard in his faithfully recreated outfit to your collection!
*Skin tone of this Nendoroid Doll is a special color to match that of the original character.

Set Contents:
Figure
Jacket
Shirt with Vest Attached
Slacks
Socks
Leather Shoes (with Magnets in Soles)
Interchangeable Hand Parts (Closed Hands (Left/Right) / Pointing Hands (Left/Right))

Articulated Stand

Title: figma Nipako
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 130mm in height. 1/3rd Scale Nipper Plastic Model Kit (PS) Included.
Descriptions:
The ultimate nipper girl joins the figma series again!
Nipako, the personification of plastic model nippers created by the metalworking town of Tsubame-Sanjou in Niigata prefecture, is joining the figma series again!

Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
She comes with three face plates including a normal expression, a confident expression and a panicked expression.
Optional parts include nippers, the hand piece of an airbrush, a craft knife and cutting mat all in figma size.
A pre-painted 1/3rd scale plastic model kit of the Ultimate Nippers are included.
The backsheet of the product packaging features a papercraft of a plastic model box and cardboard box to display with her.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

Ultimate! Nipako-chan Official Site: http://285ch.sksum.com/

Title: MODEROID Gaiking the Great
Specifications: PS&ABS assemblable plastic model kit. Not to scale. Special stand for Raiking included. Gaiking the Great: Approximately 160mm in height when built. Gaiking/Raiking/Balking: Approximately 135mm in height when built.
Descriptions:
GOODSMILE ONLINE SHOP Limited Edition Plastic Model! Behold! Kneel before the great deity!
From the anime series "GAIKING LEGEND OF DAIKU-MARYU" comes a MODEROID plastic model featuring the combination of Gaiking, Raiking and Balking—Gaiking the Great! The mecha has been recreated in detail based on its appearance from the anime. The joints are articulated for easy posing, and it comes with interchangeable hand parts and weapon parts. 
The three mecha are all included in this set and can be combined to form Gaiking the Great! Using removable and interchangeable parts, you can even recreate the combination sequence from the series. The model is made of PS&ABS materials. Colored runners and pre-painted parts are included, allowing you to easily recreate the mecha from the series with a simple assembly.
*This product is a three model set. Each model has the same specifications as the separately sold versions.

Individual models also available: MODEROID Balking, MODEROID Raiking, MODEROID Gaiking

MODEROID Special Site
https://www.goodsmile.info/en/moderoid/

Title: Junta Azumaya
Specifications: Painted 1/8th scale PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 295mm in height.
Descriptions:
"I'll make sure you can't leave me for the rest of your life."
From the popular BL comic with over 3.5 million copies sold and an anime adaption, "Dakaretai Otoko 1-i ni Odosarete Imasu." comes a 1/8th scale figure of Junta Azumaya! He's been recreated with a bunny theme as a part of the "B-style" series. 
The design is based on a specially drawn illustration by Hashigo Sakurabi! Every part of his body has been carefully captured in figure form, from his abs peeking out from his shirt to his masculine gaze. Be sure to take a look at every detail of his bunny themed outfit! A figure of Takato Saijo is also coming soon! Be sure to add them both to your collection!

Title: MODEROID Gaiking
Specifications: PS&ABS assemblable plastic model kit. Not to scale. Approximately 135mm in height when built.
Descriptions:
Presenting a new MODEROID plastic model of Gaiking!
From the anime series "GAIKING LEGEND OF DAIKU-MARYU" comes a plastic model of Gaiking! The mecha has been recreated in detail based on its appearance from the anime. The joints are articulated for easy posing, and it comes with the Gaiking Lance and Gaiking Shield. The Counter Crosses in its legs can be removed and combined with the Gaiking Lance to create the Counter Lance. Additionally, interchangeable parts are included to recreate its Face Open appearance.
Gaiking can be combined with Raiking and Balking (sold separately) in order to recreate Gaiking the Great and its combination sequence! The model is made of PS&ABS materials. Colored runners (black, white, red, gray, gold), pre-painted parts and stickers are included, allowing you to easily recreate the mecha from the series with a simple assembly.

Also available: MODEROID Gaiking the Great, MODEROID Balking, MODEROID Raiking

MODEROID Special Site
https://www.goodsmile.info/en/moderoid/

"I'm the high school detective Shinichi Kud\xc5\x8d!"

Title: Rikka Takarada: Swimsuit Style
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC figure with stand included. Approximately 220mm in height.
Descriptions:
Let's enjoy summer!
From "SSSS.GRIDMAN" comes a scale figure of Rikka Takarada in a swimsuit! The figure has been recreated based on a special illustration of Rikka and Akane at the waterside. She's been recreated enjoying the summertime with a beach ball in her hands. Interchangeable ponytail parts as seen in the anime are included.
Display with Akane Shinjo: Swimsuit Style (sold separately) to pose them as though exchanging glances. Be sure to add her to your collection!

Title: figma Vanilla
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 130mm in height.
Descriptions:
Welcome to La Soleil!
From "NEKOPARA" comes a figma of Vanilla, one of the two youngest twin sisters of the Minaduki household!

Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different poses.
A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
She comes with three face plates—a smiling face, a blushing face and a grinning face.
A tray, teapot and teacup & saucer set are included as optional parts.

Title: LittleArmory-OP3: figma Tactical Gloves (Stealth Black)
Specifications: PVC articulated figure hand parts. Non-scale. 4 left glove and 4 right glove parts included. PS non-articulated joint parts included.
Descriptions:
Equip your figma figures with the LittleArmory series!
The Stealth Black color of hand parts for TOMYTEC's 1/12th scale "LittleArmory" series of weapons and figma action figures is being rereleased due to popular demand! The hands are modelled off tactical gloves with knuckle guards, which combined with the realistic guns in the LittleArmory series will leave your figma ready for anything! 
Each set includes four different hands for a total of eight pieces that allow the guns to be held, readied and carefully aimed! Use them together with the LittleArmory weapon sets for all sorts of new posing options! The gloves are ideal for use on figma action figures such as the previously released Little Armory figma figures and figma Nipako.

* This is a set of hand parts that allow figma figures to hold items from TOMYTEC's LittleArmory set.

Title: Nendoroid Connor
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 100mm in height.
Descriptions:
"My name is Connor. I'm the android sent by CyberLife."
From the popular game "Detroit: Become Human" comes a Nendoroid of the advanced prototype android Connor! He comes with two face plates—a standard expression and a winking expression.
Optional parts include his handgun, a fish, a clear sheet featuring one of the choices from the game as well as a textless version of the clear sheet, allowing you to pose him in different situations making different choices.
The Nendoroid also comes with three interchangeable color variations of the LED ring on his temple, allowing you to display it as either blue, yellow or red. Be sure to add Nendoroid Connor to your collection!

Title: Nendoroid Leone Abbacchio

Descriptions:
"The only time I'm ever at ease is when I'm with you, Bucciarati."
From the anime series "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Golden Wind" comes a Nendoroid of Leone Abbacchio, the usually cautious man who will put his life on the line for anyone he trusts. Title: Kaori Sakuramori: A World Created with Music Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale ABS&PVC complete product with stand included. Approximately 220mm in height (not included stand).
Descriptions:
"My heart and my voice, everything feels so light, it's like I grew wings! So this is what the stage is like...!"

Specifications: PVC articulated figure hand parts. Non-scale. 4 left glove and 4 right glove parts included. PS non-articulated joint parts included.
Descriptions:
Equip your figma figures with the LittleArmory series!
TOMYTEC's 'LittleArmory' series is a set of weapons that can be used by 1/12th scale figures. This set of figma hands allows figma figures to hold the weapons from the LittleArmory set! The hands are modelled off tactical gloves with knuckle guards, which combined with the realistic guns in the LittleArmory series will leave your figma ready for anything!

Each set includes four different hands for a total of eight pieces that allow the guns to be held, readied and carefully aimed! Use them together with the LittleArmory weapon sets for all sorts of new posing options! The gloves are ideal for use on figma action figures such as the previously released Little Armory figma figures and figma Nipako.
* Parts are sold as a connected plastic kit. Parts require no assembly but do require tools to be cut apart.
* This is a set of hand parts that allow figma figures to hold items from TOMYTEC's LittleArmory set.

Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 100mm in height.
Descriptions:
b"
Nendoroid No.400 - Sakura-chan!
From the manga masterpiece 'Cardcaptor Sakura' comes a Nendoroid of the main character, Sakura Kinomoto! She comes with three expressions including a gentle smile, a more serious expression to pose her sealing cards as well as the adorable embarrassed expression she made whenever she saw something or someone she liked! She also comes with her Sealing Wand and a Clow Card to bring out the story of the series! 
Alternate lower body parts are also included together with a special version of her wand allowing you to display her using the 'Fly' spell, and Keroberos (Kero-chan) is also included to display by her side! Sakura has jumped back from the past as a Nendoroid, ready to be loved by all her fans once again! \xe2\x99\xaa

Title: Nendoroid Rapunzel
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale figure with stand included. Approximately 100mm in height.
Descriptions:
The Disney princess with magical golden hair is joining the Nendoroids!
From the movie "Tangled" comes a rerelease of Nendoroid Rapunzel! She comes with three face plates including a cheerful smile, a surprised expression with her eyes wide open as well as a gallant smile showing off her more tomboyish side. She also comes with a selection of optional parts including her weapon of choice - a frying pan, a beautiful tiara to display her as a true princess as well as painting tools and a lantern.
Rapunzel's long, golden hair has been sculpted with intricate detail, featuring large and small braids as well as flower decorations. The connecting points of the braids feature moving parts allowing her hair to be placed in different positions to recreate your favorite scenes from the movie! In addition, her best friend Pascal is also included to display by her side, so be sure to add the two to your collection!

He comes with three face plates including a standard face, a cheery smile as well as a huge smiling face for cheering on his teammates!
The Nendoroid allows you to recreate a number of memorable scenes from the series and also comes with a volleyball as well as a special base made in the image of a volleyball court. Be sure to display him with the other characters from the series and create all sorts of fun situations in Nendoroid size!

Title: HAGANE WORKS ROBOCOP

Descriptions:

-Alloy-Bodied Fully Articulated Action Figure-

Three face parts including an expression with a closed mouth, a expression as though warning his adversaries and an anguished expression are all included. Damaged head and chest parts are included as well. Open hands, closed hands, hands for holding his gun and a Terminal Strip hand are included. The Cobra Assault Cannon is included as well. The figure also comes with a display stand with storage space for the optional parts.
Be sure to display with MODEROID ED-209 (sold separately)!

Title: PLAMAX MF-48 minimum factory Tetsuya Naito
Released Date: PS 1/20th scale assemblable plastic model kit. Approximately 80mm in height.
Specifications: Max Factory
Descriptions:
A new minimum factory plastic model series using 3D scanning technology! The second model is of NEW JAPAN PRO-WRESTLING's Tetsuya Naito!
The second plastic model to join the new line from Max Factory's "minimum factory" series of plastic models is NEW JAPAN PRO-WRESTLING's Tetsuya Naito! After a detailed 3D scan with over 100 cameras, the data is converted to a mold and sculpted. Two models are included—a model that features him in his costume doing a fist bump pose and a model that features him in a cap and T-shirt in a standing pose. Decals for his T-shirt and  costume are also included.
*Adhesive is required for assembly
*The product photos show an assembled and painted complete model.
*2 model set.

Title: [BINIVINI BABY] SOFT VINYL FIGURE Hatsune Miku
Specifications: Painted soft vinyl complete product. Approximately 125mm in height.
Descriptions:
Hatsune Miku is the first in the BINIVINI BABY soft vinyl figure series!
Hatsune Miku is the first in the BINIVINI BABY soft vinyl figure series. Miku has been recreated in an adorable sitting pose.

Title: Nendoroid Osamu Miya
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 100mm in height.
Descriptions:
"But I think that, when all's said and done, you love volleyball just a teensy bit more than me."
From the popular volleyball anime series "Haikyu!!" comes a Nendoroid of Osamu Miya, twin brother of Atsumu Miya! He comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a taken aback expression and an eating expression. Parts are included to display him imitating one of Kageyama and Hinata's quick attacks, along with parts to display him doing an overhand toss, so you can recreate the Twins Quick Attack - Inverse. 
The Nendoroid also comes with a volleyball as well as a special base made in the image of a volleyball court. Additionally, a bowl of rice and chopsticks are included so you can recreate everyday situations as well. Be sure to add him to your collection along with Nendoroid Atsumu Miya (sold separately)!
Set Contents:

Back and Front Hair Parts
Face Plates x3
Body
Lower Body Part
Right Shoulder Parts x2
Left Shoulder Parts x2
Right Arm Parts x2
Right Arm Part (for Holding Chopsticks)
Left Arm Parts x4
Right Leg Parts x2
Left Leg Parts x2
Rice and Chopsticks
Volleyball
Special Volleyball Court Base

Title: Nendoroid Orphen
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 100mm in height.
Descriptions:
"I unsheathe thee, Sword of Light!"
From the anime series "Sorcerous Stabber Orphen" comes a Nendoroid of Orphen the Black Sorcerer! He comes with two face plates including a confident standard expression and an intrepid smiling expression. An effect part for recreating his magic the moment he says "I unsheathe thee, Sword of Light!" is included, along with the Sword of Baltanders, a can of peaches and a fork. Be sure to add him to your collection!

Title: Nendoroid Doll: Outfit Set (Nun)
Specifications: Materials: Cotton, Polyester, PVC, ABS, Magnets
Descriptions:
A priest outfit set for your Nendoroid Dolls!
An outfit set for use with Nendoroid Dolls. Mix and match with your Nendoroid Dolls!
Set Contents:

Pendant
Wimple
One Piece Dress
Tights
Pumps (with Magnets in Soles)

*Please note that the actual figure and torso stand are not included with this product.
*May not be compatible with certain Nendoroids depending on the character design.
Also available: Nendoroid Doll: Outfit Set (Priest)

Title: Yui Kotegawa: Bare Leg Bunny Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/4th scale PVC product. Approximately 265mm in height.
Descriptions:
The student council president is back in a Bare Leg Bunny version!
From the popular series "To Love-Ru Darkness" comes a bare leg bunny figure of Yui Kotegawa! The figure is an impressive 1/4th scale and features specially features Yui's bare legs. Be sure to display with Golden Darkness: Bare Leg Bunny Ver., Momo Belia Deviluke: Bare Leg Bunny Ver.. and Mikan Yuki: Bare Leg Bunny Ver.. (all sold separately) and create your own To Love-Ru bunny girl harem!

Title: Nendoroid Hina Tsurugi
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale figure with stand included. Approximately 100mm in height.
Descriptions:
"Another day of clear weather! Perfect for fishing!"
From the anime series "Diary of our Days at the Breakwater" comes a Nendoroid of the 1st year Umino High School student who is grossed out by live marine life, Hina Tsurugi! She comes with three face plates including a smiling expression, a nervous expression and a satisfied expression! 
Optional parts include her hat, a fishing pole, a horse mackerel, a flathead fish and a set of chopsticks and a plate. A breakwater base to recreate her fishing on the breakwater is included as well. The fish and hook of the pole feature magnets so you can display her reeling in a fish! Enjoy recreating your favorite scenes from the series!

Ashikita Town, the town which the setting of Diary of our Days at the Breakwater is based on, sustained significant damage during a period of heavy rain in Japan on the 4th of July, 2020. 

We want to work with our fans to help raise funds to support Ashikita Town with Nendoroid Hina Tsurugi. For every Nendoroid purchased, Good Smile Company will donate 300 yen to Ashikita Town to aid relief efforts.

Title: Date A Live Light Novel: Kurumi Tokisaki - Bunny Ver.
Specifications: Painted 1/7th scale PVC product with stand included. Approximately 260mm in height.
Descriptions:
"My, my. A customer?"
From KADOKAWA's Fantasia Bunko Editorial Department's light novel series "Date A Live" comes a 1/7th scale figure of heroine Kurumi Tokisaki! She's been recreated in a bunny outfit based on an illustration by Tsunako. Her outfit features a red and black color scheme, a glossy finish and real net tights, making for a gorgeous recreation with plenty of textural detail that you can see and feel. 
Even the backside of the figure that couldn't be seen in the original illustration has been recreated. Be sure to add her to your collection!

What is KDcolle?
What is KDcolle?
KADOKAWA presents a new figure brand, KDcolle (KADOKAWA Collection), featuring figures with style only possible for KADOKAWA to create. With a charm unique to experienced publishing company KADOKAWA, we bring you a new series of figures sure to make your heart beat with excitement! Expect more from the KDcolle series coming soon!

Title: Nendoroid Hunter: Male Zinogre Alpha Armor Ver. DX
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale fully articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 100mm in height.
Descriptions:
One that moves like a thunderclap and hunts like a wolf.
From the PlayStation®4/PC (Steam) game "MONSTER HUNTER WORLD: ICEBORNE" comes a fully articulated Nendoroid of a male hunter in Zinogre Alpha Armor. This special DX version includes all the parts that are included with the standard version together with bonus parts for even more display options!
He comes with two face plates including a standard expression and an intense combat expression. The Despot's Thundergale Charge Blade and a carving knife are included as optional parts, allowing you to recreate your favorite hunting poses from the game!
Additionally, the DX version comes with an interchangeable head part, the Mightning Heavy Bowgun and a latent power effect part, allowing you to enjoy the world of "MONSTER HUNTER WORLD: ICEBORNE" even more!
Also available: Nendoroid Hunter: Male Zinogre Alpha Armor Ver.

Title: Nendoroid Doll: Outfit Set (Sailor Boy - Mint Chocolate)
Specifications: Materials: Cotton, Polyester, PVC, ABS, Magnets, PMMA
Descriptions:
A sailor outfit set for use with your Nendoroid Dolls!
An outfit set for use with Nendoroid Dolls. Mix and match with your Nendoroid Dolls!

Sailor Top & Bottoms
Socks
Short Boots (with Magnets in Soles)

Title: b'POP UP PARADE Weiss Schnee '
Specifications: Painted ABS&PVC non-scale complete product with stand included. Approximately 170mm in height.
Descriptions:
b'
The second figure from RWBY comes to the POP UP PARADE series!
POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!
Created in collaboration with Rooster Teeth, the next figure to join the POP UP PARADE series is Weiss Schnee from the hit 3DCG anime "RWBY"! Enjoy the second figure in the series of POP UP PARADE figures from RWBY!

Title: b'figma Link: Twilight Princess ver. DX Edition '
Specifications: ABS&PVC non-scale articulated figure with stand included. Approximately 140mm in height
Descriptions:
b"
The hero guided by the Triforce joins the figma series!
A special edition of 'figma Link: Twilight Princess ver.' featuring various additional items is back for a rerelease!

Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
He comes with three face plates including a strong-willed and confident expression, a powerful shouting expression as well as an expression with clenched teeth.
The Master Sword and Hylian Shield are both included.
The shield can also be displayed carried on his back, just like in the game.
The DX Edition includes the Ordon Sword, Hero's Bow and Arrow, Ball and Chain, Hawkeye and the Clawshot.
The Clawshot comes with both an open and closed claw which can be interchanged to recreate different poses.
An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.

Specifications: Height: Approx. 12.5cmMaterial: Soft Vinyl, PVCAges 15 and upWindow Packaging
Descriptions:
The Great Muta joins the 16d Collection!
Presenting a soft vinyl figure of the Great Muta! The figure has been sculpted by athlete figure sculpting legend HAO. This white paint version is a GOODSMILE ONLINE SHOP exclusive item. 16d Collection 016 The Great Muta (90s Red Paint) is also available for preorder at the same time.
